<h4 align="center"><a href="https://bit.ly/2NJfQ07">Digital Business Card</a> is a super-small website providing a quick description of myself.<br>It was created with <a href="https://github.com/alcor/itty-bitty/">Itty Bitty</a> as an experiment in small website design.</h4>

<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/qjack001/Digital-Business-Card/master/assets/screenshot.png" alt="screen-shot">

## Purpose
This website's goal is to provide a quick overview of ones description and links (like a business card). Due to the website's small size, it is able to be compressed and converted into an [Itty-Bitty site](https://itty.bitty.site/#). This way, the entirety of the website is stored in the URL, and generated client-side on page-load. The website is very fast and does not need to be traditionally hosted because of this.

## Contributing
To add to this project, or to use it to start your own, download the [index.html](https://github.com/qjack001/Digital-Business-Card/blob/master/index.html) file and edit that. 
Then drag the new file into the [Itty Bitty editor](https://itty.bitty.site/edit) to generate the new URL. 
Since all the website data is hosted inside the URL, there is no way to alter the website at the current link (the current link *is* the website).

## Linking
The links to the website can be found below. The full URL is quite long (as it contains the entire website), so it may be more practical to use the shortened link or the available QR code. Please note that as the website changes, so does the URL. This means that links to the website may be out of date, resulting in a legacy version of the site. The links listed below are currently up-to-date.

**Short link:** https://bit.ly/2NJfQ07

**Full link:** https://itty.bitty.site/#Jack_Guinane_-_buisness_card/data:text/html;charset=utf-8;bxze64,

**QR code:**

<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/qjack001/Digital-Business-Card/master/assets/qr-small.png" width=200>
</h3>
